motion.author: ctessum
motion.title: Implement Cloud-J photolysis mechanism
motion.description:
As described in the paper here: https://gmd.copernicus.org/articles/8/2587/2015/gmd-8-2587-2015.pdf

The benefit is that there is a standalone version [here](https://github.com/geoschem/Cloud-J) to make implementation easier, and it include attenuation by clouds etc., which our current Fast-JX implementation doesn't have.
